## ConnectionState (component)

The ConnectionState component displays the connection status of the room in written form.

### Import

```typescript
import { ConnectionState } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <ConnectionState />
</LiveKitRoom>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                        | Modifiers | Type | Description                                                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [room?](./react/components-react.connectionstatusprops.room.md) |           | Room | _(Optional)_ The room from which the connection status should be displayed. |
